verses.text: \w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, hear \w ye|strong="G0191"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w defence|strong="G0627"\w* \add which I make\add* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

(\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w spake|strong="G4377"\w* in the \w Hebrew|strong="G1446"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1258"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w kept|strong="G3930"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w silence|strong="G2271"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G5346"\w*,)

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \add which am\add* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Tarsus|strong="G5019"\w*, \add a city\add* in \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* brought \w up|strong="G0397"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* of \w Gamaliel|strong="G1059"\w*, \add and\add* \w taught|strong="G3811"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the perfect \w manner|strong="G0195"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="G3971"\w*, and \w was|strong="G5225"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2207"\w* toward \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3739"\w* I \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* the \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w binding|strong="G1195"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivering|strong="G3860"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prisons|strong="G5438"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* doth \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the estate of the \w elders|strong="G4244"\w*: \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* I \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, and \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*, to \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w there|strong="G1566"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w for|strong="G2443"\w* to be \w punished|strong="G5097"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to pass, \w that|strong="G1096"\w*, as \w I|strong="G3427"\w* made my \w journey|strong="G4198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was come \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* unto \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w noon|strong="G3314"\w*, \w suddenly|strong="G1810"\w* there \w shone|strong="G4015"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* a \w great|strong="G2425"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* round \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* I \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ground|strong="G1475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \wj  \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w persecutest thou|strong="G1377"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* art \w thou|strong="G1488"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Jesus|strong="G2424"\+w* \+w of Nazareth|strong="G3480"\+w*, \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w persecutest|strong="G1377"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w saw|strong="G2300"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w afraid|strong="G1719"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall I \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \wj  \+w Arise|strong="G0450"\+w*, \+w and go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Damascus|strong="G1154"\+w*; \+w and there|strong="G2546"\+w* \+w it shall be told|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w are appointed|strong="G5021"\+w* \+w for thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w to do|strong="G4160"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* I \w could|strong="G1689"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w see|strong="G1689"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, being led by the \w hand|strong="G5496"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that were \w with|strong="G4895"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, I \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w*, a \w devout|strong="G2152"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, having a good \w report|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \add there\add*,

\w Came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2186"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4549"\w*, receive thy \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*. \w And|strong="G2504"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* looked \w up|strong="G0308"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="G4400"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, that thou shouldest \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* Just \w One|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shouldest \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* of \w what|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* tarriest \w thou|strong="G3195"\w*? \w arise|strong="G0450"\w*, and be \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wash \w away|strong="G0628"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, calling \w on|strong="G1941"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to pass, \w that|strong="G1096"\w*, when \w I|strong="G3427"\w* was come \w again|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* while \w I|strong="G3450"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w trance|strong="G1611"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \wj  \+w Make haste|strong="G4692"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w get thee|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w quickly|strong="G5034"\+w* \+w out of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1360"\+w* \+w they will|strong="G3858"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G3858"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w testimony|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w concerning|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.\wj*

And \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w imprisoned|strong="G5439"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beat|strong="G1194"\w* in \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w martyr|strong="G3144"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w* was \w shed|strong="G1632"\w*, \w I|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2252"\w* standing \w by|strong="G2186"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* consenting \w unto|strong="G4909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G0336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* the \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w slew|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \wj  \+w Depart|strong="G4198"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w will send|strong="G1821"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w far hence|strong="G3112"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the Gentiles|strong="G1484"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w gave|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w audience|strong="G0191"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add then\add* lifted \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, Away \w with|strong="G0142"\w* such \w a|strong="G5108"\w* \add fellow\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2520"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fit|strong="G2520"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2905"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w off|strong="G4495"\w* \add their\add* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w threw|strong="G0906"\w* \w dust|strong="G2868"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w air|strong="G0109"\w*,

The chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to be \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w castle|strong="G3925"\w*, and bade \w that|strong="G2036"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should be \w examined|strong="G0426"\w* by \w scourging|strong="G3148"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w know|strong="G1921"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* they \w cried|strong="G2019"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* against \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they \w bound|strong="G4385"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* with \w thongs|strong="G2438"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* stood \w by|strong="G2476"\w*, Is it \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to \w scourge|strong="G3147"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that is a \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w uncondemned|strong="G0178"\w*?

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add that\add*, he \w went|strong="G4334"\w* and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Take \w heed|strong="G3708"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* thou \w doest|strong="G4160"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* a \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w*? He \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Yea|strong="G3483"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, With a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w sum|strong="G2774"\w* \w obtained|strong="G2932"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w freedom|strong="G4174"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G1080"\w* \add free\add* \w born|strong="G1080"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* they \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* have \w examined|strong="G0426"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* was \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*, after he \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w had|strong="G2258"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

On the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w*, \w because|strong="G1161"\w* he \w would|strong="G1014"\w* have \w known|strong="G1097"\w* the \w certainty|strong="G0804"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G5101"\w* he was \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, he \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \add his\add* \w bands|strong="G1199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w* to \w appear|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G2609"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w*, and set \w him|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.
